SELECT DISTINCT som.* , pd.STK_DESC , CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN srv.SRV_PRD_START_DT AND srv.SRV_PRD_EXPR_DT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END CHK_SERVICE , NVL(rs.STUS_CODE_ID,'0') RENTAL_STUS FROM SAL1010V som join sal0002d sod on som.ord_id = sod.sales_ord_id JOIN SYS0026M pd ON sod.ITM_STK_ID = pd.STK_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0090D config on config.srv_so_id = som.ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0088D srv on config.SRV_CONFIG_ID = srv.SRV_CONFIG_ID AND AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(srv.SRV_PRD_START_DT) AND TRUNC(srv.SRV_PRD_EXPR_DT) LEFT JOIN SAL0071D rs on rs.SALES_ORD_ID = som.ORD_ID WHERE som.STUS_CODE_ID = 4 AND som.CUST_ID = #{custId}
AND som.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT DISTINCT
STATE AS CODE_ID, STATE AS CODE_NAME
CITY AS CODE_ID, CITY AS CODE_NAME
POSTCODE AS CODE_ID, POSTCODE AS CODE_NAME
AREA AS CODE_ID, AREA AS CODE_NAME
FROM SYS0064M WHERE STATUS_ID = 1 AND COUNTRY = 'Malaysia'
AND STATE = #{state}
AND CITY = #{city}
AND POSTCODE = #{postcode}
AND AREA_ID NOT LIKE 'DM%'
ORDER BY STATE
ORDER BY CITY
ORDER BY POSTCODE
ORDER BY AREA
